verses.verse: Then came <S%H935><s%> certain <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> have set up <S%H5927><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> their heart, <S%H3820><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> their face: <S%H6440><s%> should I be inquired of at all <S%H1875><s%> <S%H1875><s%> by them?

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them, and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Every man <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H834><s%> setteth up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> his idols <S%H1544><s%> in <S%H413><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> and putteth <S%H7760><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and cometh <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the prophet; <S%H5030><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> him that cometh <S%H935><s%> according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his idols; <S%H1544><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> I may take <S%H8610><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their own heart, <S%H3820><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they are all <S%H3605><s%> estranged <S%H2114><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me through their idols. <S%H1544><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Repent, <S%H7725><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> yourselves from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> your idols; <S%H1544><s%> and turn away <S%H7725><s%> your faces <S%H6440><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of the stranger <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1616><s%> that <S%H834><s%> sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which separateth himself <S%H5144><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> me, and setteth up <S%H5927><s%> his idols <S%H1544><s%> in <S%H413><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> and putteth <S%H7760><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and cometh <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of him concerning me; I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> him by myself:

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that <S%H1931><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and will make <S%H7760><s%> him a sign <S%H226><s%> and a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> and I will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> from the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of my people; <S%H5971><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> be deceived <S%H6601><s%> when he hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> a thing, <S%H1697><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have deceived <S%H6601><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> prophet, <S%H5030><s%> and I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and will destroy <S%H8045><s%> him from the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the punishment of their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> even as the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of him that seeketh <S%H1875><s%> unto him;

That <S%H4616><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may go no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> astray <S%H8582><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> me, neither <S%H3808><s%> be polluted <S%H2930><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> their transgressions; <S%H6588><s%> but that they may be <S%H1961><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> may be <S%H1961><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> again to <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> sinneth <S%H2398><s%> against me by trespassing <S%H4603><s%> grievously, <S%H4604><s%> then will I stretch out <S%H5186><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, and will break <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of the bread <S%H3899><s%> thereof, and will send <S%H7971><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> upon it, and will cut off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> it:

Though these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> and Job, <S%H347><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> in <S%H8432><s%> it, they <S%H1992><s%> should deliver <S%H5337><s%> but their own souls <S%H5315><s%> by their righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

If <S%H3863><s%> I cause noisome <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> and they spoil <S%H7921><s%> it, so that it be <S%H1961><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> that no man <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1097><s%> may pass through <S%H5674><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the beasts: <S%H2416><s%>

Though these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H376><s%> were in <S%H8432><s%> it, as I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> neither <S%H518><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H518><s%> daughters; <S%H1323><s%> they only <S%H905><s%> shall be delivered, <S%H5337><s%> but the land <S%H776><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> desolate. <S%H8077><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if I bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Sword, <S%H2719><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> through the land; <S%H776><s%> so that I cut off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> it:

Though these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H376><s%> were in <S%H8432><s%> it, as I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> they shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> nor daughters, <S%H1323><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> only <S%H905><s%> shall be delivered themselves. <S%H5337><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if I send <S%H7971><s%> a pestilence <S%H1698><s%> into <S%H413><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it in blood, <S%H1818><s%> to cut off <S%H3772><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> it man <S%H120><s%> and beast: <S%H929><s%>

Though Noah, <S%H5146><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> and Job, <S%H347><s%> were in <S%H8432><s%> it, as I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> neither <S%H518><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H518><s%> daughter; <S%H1323><s%> they shall but deliver <S%H5337><s%> their own souls <S%H5315><s%> by their righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> How much more <S%H637><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> I send <S%H7971><s%> my four <S%H702><s%> sore <S%H7451><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and the noisome <S%H7451><s%> beast, <S%H2416><s%> and the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> to cut off <S%H3772><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> it man <S%H120><s%> and beast? <S%H929><s%>

Yet, behold, <S%H2009><s%> therein shall be left <S%H3498><s%> a remnant <S%H6413><s%> that shall be brought forth, <S%H3318><s%> both sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> they shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, and ye shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> and their doings: <S%H5949><s%> and ye shall be comforted <S%H5162><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have brought <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> even concerning <S%H854><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have brought <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it.

And they shall comfort <S%H5162><s%> you, when <S%H3588><s%> ye see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> their ways <S%H1870><s%> and their doings: <S%H5949><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> without cause <S%H2600><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> in it, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
